How Escrow Protects You

Your funds are secure with our milestone-based escrow system. Payments are only released when each stage is completed successfully.

Payment Milestones

1

TeleConsult

10%
$610

Initial consultation and treatment planning

2

Admission

40%
$2,440

Hospital admission and pre-operative preparation

3

Surgery

40%
$2,440

Medical procedure and immediate post-op care

4

Discharge

10%
$610

Final recovery and follow-up planning
